topic.title: Onboarder Provisioning Runbook
topic.shortdesc: Step-by-step guide for provisioning new employees using Qbankâ€™s internal Onboarder tool.

ol.li: Log into the Qbank Admin Console
Enter employee details: name, role, department, manager
Select provisioning profile (e.g., Developer, Support, Contractor)

Review auto-assigned resources:
Email account
Slack invite
Jira, Confluence, GitHub access
VPN credentials

section.title: Manual Overrides
section.p: Use manual provisioning for contractors, interns, and temporary access requests.

ul.li: Provisioning triggers are logged in the audit trail
Failed provisioning attempts generate alerts in Slack
Profiles can be customized via the Admin Console
